issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Batter State problems on Platform API

comments.body:
{html}

i've improved upon this.

note, to test the battery state change events, you'll have to test a little differently. the battery state/level on changes at 5% increments. i was able to trigger by doing this...

open up the platform tab and the platform test and leave that screen open. go to the remote video test and let it play for a little bit (you may have to play a couple of times). this should drain the battery. you should eventually see an alert with notification of battery change.

{html}
